author: Onlymediumsteak
body: The possibility certainly exists and will never be zero until we reach the point. However, we also keep on increasing our resources and capabilities, just take a look at the [system Cerebras](https://www.zdnet.com/article/cerebras-prepares-for-the-era-of-120-trillion-parameter-neural-networks/) announced which will ship in Q4 this year, AI models have shown to heavily correlate to the number of parameters so a 100 fold increase in this short of time frame and with a low hardware cost, is nothing to sneeze at. AI will also greatly improve chips in the future, [Synopsys](https://venturebeat.com/2021/08/23/synopsys-ceo-ai-designed-chips-will-generate-1000x-performance-in-10-years/) just startet implementing and rolling out their features.

author: bearcat2202
body:
$SNPS because it’s an earnings growth machine and they buy back so much of their stock. 

Plus if has a moat in the industry. Returns have been phenomenal.
